name: Moorhuhn: The Good, the Egg and the Ugly
name_original: Moorhuhn: The Good, the Egg and the Ugly
description:
Moorhuhn: The Good, the Egg and the Ugly is an arcade game developed by Phenomedia Publishing. It came out on 01-10-2005. Phenomedia Publishing published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Moorhuhn: The Good, the Egg and the Ugly is available on PC.
